articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Shooter dead and rally attendee killed at Trump event in Pennsylvania, Butler County District attorney tells AP.
articles.title: Shooter dead and rally attendee killed at Trump event in Pennsylvania, Butler County District attorney tells AP

articles.author: JILL COLVIN, COLLEEN LONG, JULIE CARR SMYTH, ERIC TUCKER and MICHELLE L. PRICE
articles.description: BUTLER, Pa. (AP) — The shooting at former President Donald Trump’s rally in Pennsylvania is being investigated as an attempted assassination of the former president and presumptive Republican nominee, law enforcement officials say.
articles.title: Shooting at Trump rally is being investigated as assassination attempt, AP sources say

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.description: Donald Trump’s campaign says he is “fine” after being whisked off the stage at a rally in Butler, Pennsylvania after apparent gunshots rang through the crowd. A statement says “President Trump thanks law enforcement and first responders for their quick action during this heinous act.” It adds that “he is fine and is being checked out at a local medical facility.
articles.title: The Latest: Trump whisked from stage following apparent gunfire at rally, says he is fine

articles.author: MOHAMED JAHJOUH
articles.description: KHAN YOUNIS, Gaza Strip (AP) — Israel said it targeted Hamas’ shadowy military commander in a massive strike Saturday in the crowded southern Gaza Strip that killed at least 90 people including children, according to local health officials.
articles.title: Israeli strike targets the Hamas military commander and kills at least 90 in southern Gaza

articles.author: SEUNG MIN KIM
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Joe Biden is on a public and private blitz to shake off concerns about his cognitive capacities.But with public doubts about his fitness to serve unabating, Biden’s every move is now under a withering microscope as any potential stumble risks becoming magnified and delivering another blow to his candidacy.
articles.title: Biden's supporters want to 'let Joe be Joe' — but his stumbles are now under a bigger spotlight

articles.author: ELLEN KNICKMEYER
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — European allies in NATO are stepping up their military spending, just as Donald Trump wanted. They're pointing to common interests, such as concerns over China.
articles.title: With words, deeds and arms deals, allies make the case for NATO in terms that would appeal to Trump

articles.author: MARK KENNEDY
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Richard Simmons, television's hyperactive court jester of physical fitness who built a mini-empire in his trademark tank tops and short shorts by urging the overweight to exercise and eat better, died Saturday.
articles.title: Richard Simmons, a fitness guru who mixed laughs and sweat, dies at 76

articles.author: MARK KENNEDY
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Dr. Ruth Westheimer, the diminutive sex therapist who became a pop icon, media star and best-selling author through her frank talk about once-taboo bedroom topics, has died. She was 96.
articles.title: Dr. Ruth Westheimer, America’s diminutive and pioneering sex therapist, dies at 96

articles.author: SAMYA KULLAB and ELISE MORTON
articles.description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Russian shelling of Ukraine killed four people on Saturday, officials said, as the two countries exchanged drone attacks, one of which set ablaze a Russian oil depot. Two people died in Ukraine’s partly occupied Kherson region and two were wounded in the attack close to the regional capital, said Gov.
articles.title: Shelling kills 4 in Ukraine as a drone attack sparks fire at an oil depot in Russia

articles.author: JULIE CARR SMYTH
articles.description: Conservative groups are systematically attempting to challenge the legitimacy of large numbers of voter registrations across the country before the presidential election.The strategy is part of a wider effort raising questions about the integrity of this year's election as former President Donald Trump repeatedly claims without evidence that his opponents are trying to cheat.
articles.title: Conservative groups are pushing to clean voter rolls. Others see an effort to sow election distrust
